segments.text: What did you think of the film ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I liked it . I thought it was great .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I liked it , too . Did you like the acting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I thought it was excellent . Didn't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really . I thought it was disappointing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a nice cinema , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think so ? I don't like it very much . I found it rather uncomfortable .
segments.speaker: S1
